name: ip_geolocation
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ip_geolocation_api.
Tool description: Get the location of any IP with a world-class API serving city, region, country and lat/long data.
API description: This function retrieves geolocation information for a given IP address using the Toolbench API.

ip_address.description: The IP address for which to retrieve geolocation data.
